duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and own the product vision and roadmap, from technical frameworks to customer-facing features encompassing advanced data security.
Create backlogs, working regularly with the team to refine and add detail where needed; Collaborate closely with technology teams.
Define metrics and utilize data-driven insights to create cutting-edge data protection capabilities, ensuring data privacy and integrity and enabling the continuous improvement of UX/UI design.
Lead user research efforts to understand data security pain points and develop innovative features.
Explore the integration of state-of-the-art technologies to enhance our data security platform.
Navigate complex cybersecurity and regulatory environments to ensure compliance and effectiveness.
Understand and maintain awareness of competitors and verticals; prepare ad-hoc reports related to financial position, competitive position and market potential as needed.
Manage stakeholder expectations within and/or across functions, including Engineering, Operations, Marketing, and Sales.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related fields. MBA or equivalent experience desired.
